author: psmith
msg: Changes to back out the addition of the setActive method.

author: psmith
msg: backed out the addition of the setter method for the Active property.
Exposed the boolean as a protected member so subclasses could modify
it for their own purposes.  This is probably an interim change until
the activation/deactivation of Plugin's is further explored.

author: psmith
msg: Fix for the Receiver menu check box, it wasn't always in sync
with the current state of view.
It's arguable about where this action should appear in the menu system.
Particularly since the View menu is now so long.

author: psmith
msg: added hacky method for displaying a message, as it was too far
left, and flush against the border.
Probably not the best way to do this...
